product_name: Leki Micro Vario Ti Cor-Tec Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: These women's poles feature innovative Aergon grips known for their edgeless shape and comfortable hand positioning. Plus, an internal tension cord automatically boosts durability at any length.
